caption.p: ( a) CV curves with a scan speed of 100 mV s −1 in O 2-saturated electrolyte for the 1A-T series and the Pt/C catalyst; ( b) LSV curve of the obtained samples and Pt/C catalysts (5 V s −1, 1600 rpm); ( c) Onset potential of 1A-T and the commercial catalyst; ( d) Koutecky–Levich plot for the samples at 0.45 V.
